name: Trazodone Hydrochloride
indications: trazodone hydrochloride tablets indicated treatment major depressive disorder ( mdd ) adults .
contraindications: starting dose : 150 mg divided doses daily . may increased 50 mg per day every three four days . maximum dose : 400 mg per day divided doses ( 2 ) . trazodone hydrochloride tablets taken shortly meal light snack ( 2 ) . tablets swallowed whole broken half along score line , chewed crushed ( 2 ) . discontinued , gradual dose reduction recommended ( 2 ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: trazodone hydrochloride tablets , usp 50 mg white white , round , biconvex shaped functionally scored tablets , debossed ‘ l ’ bisect ‘ 2 ’ one side plain side . bottles 30 ndc 70010-231-03 bottles 100 ndc 70010-231-01 bottles 500 ndc 70010-231-05 bottles 1000 ndc 70010-231-10 trazodone hydrochloride tablets , usp 100 mg white white , round , biconvex shaped functionally scored tablets , debossed ‘ l ’ bisect ‘ 3 ’ one side plain side . bottles 30 ndc 70010-232-03 bottles 100 ndc 70010-232-01 bottles 500 ndc 70010-232-05 bottles 1000 ndc 70010-232-10 trazodone hydrochloride tablets , usp 150 mg white white , oval , flat faced bevelled edge functionally scored tablets one full bisect two partial trisects debossed “ l ” “ 4 ” one side two full trisects debossed “ 50 ” “ 50 ” “ 50 ” part side . bottles 30 ndc 70010-233-03 bottles 100 ndc 70010-233-01 bottles 500 ndc 70010-233-05 directions using correct score breaking tablet , please refer following : - 50 mg , break score either left right side tablet ( one-third tablet ) . - 75 mg , break score middle tablet ( one-half tablet ) . - 100 mg , break score either left right side tablet ( two-thirds tablet ) . - 150 mg , entire tablet . trazodone hydrochloride tablets , usp 300 mg white white , oval , flat faced bevelled edge functionally scored tablets one full bisect two partial trisects debossed “ l ” “ 5 ” one side two full trisects debossed “ 100 ” “ 100 ” “ 100 ” part middle “ 100 ” perpendicular “ 100 ” side . bottles 30 ndc 70010-234-03 bottles 100 ndc 70010-234-01 bottles 500 ndc 70010-234-05 directions using correct score breaking tablet , please refer following : - 100 mg , break score either left right side tablet ( one-third tablet ) - 150 mg , break score middle tablet ( one-half tablet ) . - 200 mg , break score either left right side tablet ( two-thirds tablet ) . - 300 mg , entire tablet . store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15ºc 30ºc ( 59°f 86ºf ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense child-resistant closure tight , light-resistant container .
adverseReactions: trazodone hydrochloride tablets contraindicated : • patients taking , within 14 days stopping , monoamine oxidase inhibitors ( maois ) , including maois linezolid intravenous methylene blue , increased risk serotonin syndrome [ ( 5.2 ) , ( 7.1 ) ] .
indications_original: Trazodone hydrochloride tablets are indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) in adults.
contraindications_original: Starting dose: 150 mg in divided doses daily. May be increased by 50 mg per day every three to four days. Maximum dose: 400 mg per day in divided doses ( 2 ). Trazodone hydrochloride tablets should be taken shortly after a meal or light snack ( 2 ). Tablets should be swallowed whole or broken in half along the score line, and should not be chewed or crushed ( 2 ). When discontinued, gradual dose reduction is recommended ( 2 ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Trazodone Hydrochloride Tablets, USP 50 mg are white to off white, round, biconvex shaped functionally scored tablets, debossed with ‘L’ bisect ‘2’ on one side and plain on other side.
                  
                  
                  Bottles of 30 NDC 70010-231-03
                  Bottles of 100 NDC 70010-231-01
                  
                  Bottles of 500 NDC 70010-231-05
                  Bottles of 1000 NDC 70010-231-10
                  
                  
                  
                  
                     Trazodone Hydrochloride Tablets, USP 100 mg are white to off white, round, biconvex shaped functionally scored tablets, debossed with ‘L’ bisect ‘3’ on one side and plain on other side.
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Bottles of 30 NDC 70010-232-03
                  Bottles of 100 NDC 70010-232-01
                  Bottles of 500 NDC 70010-232-05
                  Bottles of 1000 NDC 70010-232-10
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  
                     Trazodone Hydrochloride Tablets, USP 150 mg are white to off white, oval, flat faced bevelled edge functionally scored tablets with one full bisect and two partial trisects debossed with “L” and “4” on one side and two full trisects debossed with “50” “50” “50” on each part on other side.
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Bottles of 30 NDC 70010-233-03
                  Bottles of 100 NDC 70010-233-01
                  Bottles of 500 NDC 70010-233-05
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Directions for using the correct score when breaking the tablet, please refer to the following:
  
- For 50 mg, break the score on either the left or right side of the tablet (one-third of a tablet).
 
                  
                  
                  - For 75 mg, break the score down the middle of the tablet (one-half of a tablet).
                  
                  - For 100 mg, break the score on either the left or right side of the tablet (two-thirds of a tablet).
                  
                  - For 150 mg, use the entire tablet.
                  
                  
                  
                     Trazodone Hydrochloride Tablets, USP 300 mg are white to off white, oval, flat faced bevelled edge functionally scored tablets with one full bisect and two partial trisects debossed with “L” and “5” on one side and two full trisects debossed with “100” “100” “100” on each part with middle “100” perpendicular to the other “100”s on other side.
                  
                  
                  
                  
                  Bottles of 30 NDC 70010-234-03
                  Bottles of 100 NDC 70010-234-01
  
Bottles of 500 NDC 70010-234-05
 
                  
                  
                  
                  Directions for using the correct score when breaking the tablet, please refer to the following:
  
- For 100 mg, break the score on either the left or right side of the tablet (one-third of a tablet)
 
                  
                  
                  - For 150 mg, break the score down the middle of the tablet (one-half of a tablet).
                  
                  - For 200 mg, break the score on either the left or right side of the tablet (two-thirds of a tablet).
                  
                  - For 300 mg, use the entire tablet.
                  
                  
                  
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F); excursions permitted between 15ºC and 30ºC (59°F to 86ºF) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  
                  
                  Dispense with a child-resistant closure in a tight, light-resistant container.
adverseReactions_original:
Trazodone hydrochloride tablets are contraindicated in: 
    • Patients taking, or within 14 days of stopping, monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs), including MAOIs such as linezolid or intravenous methylene blue, because of an increased risk of serotonin syndrome
 
  [see
  
   Warnings and Precautions (5.2),
  
   Drug Interactions (7.1)]
 
  .
